alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Catawba; Gaston; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 9:38PM EDT until August 26 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southeastern Catawba County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Eastern Lincoln County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... South central Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northwestern Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern Gaston County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 937 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Huntersville, or near Westport, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Huntersville, Cornelius, Mt Holly, Davidson, Stanley, Westport, Lake Norman, Lake Norman State Park, Boger City and Iron Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Cabarrus; Catawba; Gaston; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg
